title: 1 GB per month
info: 1GB of internet for 30 days at the price of 92 Afghanis. Send A 1GB to 740 to activate and D 1GB to deactivate .

title: 2GB per month
info: 2 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 140 Afghanis. Send A 2GB to 740 to activate and D 2GB to deactivate .

title: 3GB per month
info: 3 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 184 Afghanis. Send A 3GB to 740 to activate and D 3GB to deactivate .

title: 4GB monthly
info: 4 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 230 Afghanis. To activate A 4GB and to deactivate D 4GB to 740.

title: 5 GB per month
info: 5 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 276 Afghanis. Send A 5GB to 740 to activate and A 5GB to deactivate .

title: 10GB per month

title: 30 GB per month

title: 50 GB per month
info: 50 GB of Internet for 60 days at the price of 1499 Afghanis. To activate A, send 50 GB and to deactivate D, send 50 GB to 740.
